Text: Create your account to add your own outfits
Name: Full Name
EmailRequired: Please enter a valid email address
PasswordValidation1: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
PasswordValidation2: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
PasswordValidation3: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
PasswordValidation4: Password must contain at least one number.
PasswordValidation5: Password must contain at least one special character.
ConfirmPasswordValidation: Password is not the same as confirm password
MinLength: Name should cointain more than 3 characters (╥﹏╥)
ConfirmEmailText: A confirmation email has been sent to your mail. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to verify your account
